Package alix.lucene.search

Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitsFromQuery
    A query giving results as bits.
    CollectorBits
    Collect found document as a set of docids in a bitSet.
    Corpus
    This object handle information of a “corpus” : a set of docId in a lucene index.
    CorpusQuery
    Query with a document iterator backed on a BitSet (the corpus).
    Doc
    Tools to display a document
    DocRail
    A flatten version of a term vector for a document field.
    FieldFacet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FieldInt
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some stats..
    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    FormEnum
    An iterator over a sorted array of formId.
    HiliteFormatter
    Creates a formatted snippet from the top passages.
    Marker
    A light hiliter using a Lucene analyzer and a compiled automaton, designed for short texts (ex: show found words when searching in titles).
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
    SimilarityOccs  
    SimilarityTheme  
    Specif
    Interface for a scorer to calculate specific terms from a corpus or a part.
    SpecifBinomial
    Implementation of a binomial scorer.
    SpecifBM25  
    SpecifChi2
    Implementation of a Chi2 scorer formPart f : la fréquence de l’événement dans la partie ; formAll F : la fréquence totale de l’événement dans le corpus ; wcPart t : le nombre total d’événements ayant lieu dans la partie ; wcAll T : le nombre total d’événements ayant lieu dans l’ensemble des parties.
    SpecifDice
    Dice, "2*m11 / (m10² + m01²)"
    SpecifDiceTf
    Dice, "2*m11 / (m10² + m01²)"
    SpecifHypergeo
    Implementation of the Lafon algorithm, used to score terms https://www.persee.fr/docAsPDF/mots_0243-6450_1980_num_1_1_1008.pdf Does not work for real life corpus, too much Infinity or NaN.
    SpecifJaccard
    "Jaccard", "m11 / (m10 + m01 + m11)"
    SpecifJaccardTf
    "Jaccard", "m11 / (m10 + m01 + m11)"
    SpecifOccs  
    SpecifTfidf
    “tf-idf” used as an algorithm to find specific terms of one or more documents (a part), compared to the whole corpus.
    TermList
    An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice.
